# sg-avatar



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                              | Type                                        | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | ---------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `alt`      | `alt`      | Alt text for image                       | `string`                                    | `undefined` |
| `bordered` | `bordered` | Show border                              | `boolean`                                   | `false`     |
| `color`    | `color`    | Background color (when showing initials) | `string`                                    | `undefined` |
| `name`     | `name`     | User name (used for initials fallback)   | `string`                                    | `undefined` |
| `shape`    | `shape`    | Shape                                    | `"circle" \| "rounded" \| "square"`         | `'circle'`  |
| `size`     | `size`     | Size variant                             | `"lg" \| "md" \| "sm" \| "xl" \| "xs"`      | `'md'`      |
| `src`      | `src`      | Image source URL                         | `string`                                    | `undefined` |
| `status`   | `status`   | Show online/offline status               | `"away" \| "busy" \| "offline" \| "online"` | `undefined` |
